snippet.title: Mandagon - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Official trailer for Mandagon, a short, artful, free-to-play 2D platformer inspired by Tibetan theology and philosophy. Published 13 July 2016.

Mandagon release dates:
- Windows PC: 4 August 2016

http://store.steampowered.com/app/461560/
